ygData.subject: Heard about a quest...
ygData.msgSnippet: I am sure if any of you have traveled to Crushbone you have encoutered death incarnate (Dvinn) at some point. I have obtained his weapon-an ornate dagger dmg 3
ygData.messageBody:
I am sure if any of you have traveled to Crushbone you have encoutered
death incarnate (Dvinn) at some point. I have obtained his weapon-an
ornate dagger dmg 3 delay 20-and i heard that it is part of a quest,
maybe in Rivervale???, in which you get a hat that gives you charisma
+10 when you are wearing it. Anyone have any info on this quest? Any
help would be most appreciated. Thanks in advance.
-Sabretooth, Warrior of the Wolves
